forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 70. West wind 3 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
Beneath a glowing canopy of pale blue sky, Downtown San Francisco finds itself basking in the warmth of an early morning sun. The vibrant light shapes the cityscape as it stretches toward the horizon, where the iconic Golden Gate Bridge stands, partially veiled by wisps of fog that dance in the inland breeze. The air, cool yet inviting, carries a light southern wind, ensuring the day feels both refreshing and full of promise.

As the sun climbs, temperatures will elevate to a comfortable near seventy degrees, perfect for leisurely pursuits throughout the day. The forecast suggests a gentle shift into evening, where the warmth joins the allure of a partly cloudy sky. Breezes from the southwest may stir up the atmosphere to keep it ever so dynamic, whispering hints of night and tranquility as temperatures dip toward fifty-two. Selecting attire that layers well will serve one best; a light sweater or jacket would complement the day and smoothly transition into evening.

Those wandering through the vibrant streets can take advantage of this perfect weather with a stroll along the waterfront or an expedition through the city's rich tapestry of parks and cafes. The day beckons with possibilities for connecting with the luminous character of this city, whether it be savoring a quiet moment outdoors or exploring hidden gems nestled within the urban landscape—all framed by this uniquely San Franciscan blend of sun and fog.
